resources.string: How Do You Say It In English?
Start a simple conversation with ChatGPT and ask it any question.
Start a English only conversation with ChatGPT, you can use this function to practice your English.
ChatGPT will correct any English sentences you send to it.
If you have any expressions that you don\'t know how to say in English, you can ask ChatGPT in this option.
ChatGPT will try to chat with you in a colloquial language as much as possible.
